info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 30 at 3:44PM MST until July 30 at 5:45PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR WEST CENTRAL MOHAVE COUNTY... At 344 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms had dissipated around the area between Dolan Springs and the intersection of Pierce Ferry, Stockton Hill and Antares roads. Earlier heavy rainfall will produce ongoing flash flooding. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Pierce Ferry, Stockton Hill and Antares roads. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
